Title: The Apartment
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), David Quandt, Gil Ozeri (executive story editor), Lakshmi Sundaram (story editor)
Actors: Andy Samberg, Stephanie Beatriz, Terry Crews, Melissa Fumero
Plot: Due to his crippling debt, Jake faces losing his apartment, and asks Gina for help. Rosa and Charles clash with one of the weekend officers, and Holt and Terry ask their officers to conduct self-evaluations.
